mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pmap ( boardno , address_name , category_group_code , categoy_group_name , category_name , id , phone , place_name , place_url , road_address_name , x , y ) VALUES (#{boardno } , #{address_name } , #{category_group_code } , #{categoy_group_name } , #{category_name } , #{id } , #{phone } , #{place_name } , #{place_url } , #{road_address_name } , #{x } , #{y } );
